summary: This is an email chain from September 2020 between Assistant U.S. Attorney Alison Moe and defense attorney Christian Everdell regarding a letter from Ghislaine Maxwell's counsel. The correspondence involves scheduling a call to discuss the letter, indicating ongoing legal proceedings in Maxwell's case.

persons.name: Alison Moe
persons.context: The primary recipient of the email chain, working for the Southern District of New York, seeking to schedule a call to discuss a letter from Maxwell's defense counsel.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Attorney at Cohen & Gresser LLP who sent the initial email on September 21, 2020, attaching a letter regarding his client Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the attached letter from her defense counsel, indicating she is the client being represented in the legal matter discussed.

persons.name: Mark S. Cohen
persons.context: Copied on the initial email from Christian Everdell regarding the letter about Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: Copied on the initial email from Christian Everdell regarding the letter about Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca
persons.context: Copied on the initial email from Christian Everdell regarding the letter about Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: Everdell is sending a letter regarding Maxwell, indicating he is part of her legal defense team.
Prosecutor and defense attorney communicating to schedule a call regarding a legal matter in Maxwell's case.
Cohen is copied on defense correspondence regarding Maxwell, indicating his involvement in her legal defense.
Menninger is copied on defense correspondence regarding Maxwell, indicating her involvement in her legal defense.

events.title: Defense Letter Submission
events.description: Christian Everdell sends a letter regarding Ghislaine Maxwell to prosecutor Alison Moe.

events.title: Scheduling of Legal Call
events.description: Email exchange to schedule a call between prosecutor Alison Moe and defense attorney Christian Everdell to discuss the letter regarding Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations.address: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
locations.context: Office address of Assistant U.S. Attorney Alison Moe at the Southern District of New York.
Office address of Cohen & Gresser LLP, the law firm representing Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document shows ongoing legal communication in September 2020 between the prosecution and defense in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
Christian Everdell, Mark S. Cohen, Laura Menninger, and Jeff Pagliuca are all part of Maxwell's defense legal team.
Assistant U.S. Attorney Alison Moe is the lead prosecutor corresponding with the defense team.
The correspondence involves scheduling a call to discuss a letter from Maxwell's counsel, indicating active case management.
The document confirms Maxwell's legal representation by Cohen & Gresser LLP during her prosecution.
